resources.string: CUREYA (registered as Aspexx Health solutions Pvt Ltd ) collaborated with stakeholders include - ROOTSKILLS , ROOTSAPS , World Yoga associations , Flagbits technologies and many more . The recent online webinars are conducted by alternative practitioners that include - Ayurveda Experts , Energy Healing experts , Mental Health Counselors etc . CUREYA primarily objective is ‘ Health for All ‘ , by reducing the medical expenditure , eliminating the information asymmetry , promoting health awareness and achieving inclusive and holistic approach for healthcare treatments .
Made with love in india to empower healthcare services.
